summary.span: Lo spazio dei nomi fornisce i metodi definiti negli standard LDAP (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol) versione 3 (V3) e DSML (Directory Services Markup Language) versione 2.0 (V2).

span.span: The namespace provides the methods defined in the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) version 3 (V3) and Directory Services Markup Language (DSML) version 2.0 (V2) standards.
